content: **crocheted gingerbread house / christmas decoration in drops safran piece is worked bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsgingerbreadlane drops design pattern e-410 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx 5 cm height approx 6 cm drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 18 off white 50 g colour 19 red 50 g colour 22 almond 50 g colour 68 coffee 1 house weighs approx 6 g drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm **crochet gauge** 28 treble crochets in width and 16 row vertically on hook size 2 5 = 10 x 10 cm 28 double crochets in width and 35 row vertically on hook size 2 5 = 10 x 10 cm remember remember that the hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized hook or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized hook
